content: Santiago Franco - Royal Holloway Research Portal Santiago Franco Dr Lecturer in Computer Science (Soft Eng), Department of Computer ScienceCentre for Intelligent Systems EmailSantiago.FrancoAixelarhul.acuk TW20 0EX Personal profile Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all. This person’s work contributes towards the following SDG(s): Collaborations and top research areas from the last five years Recent external collaboration on country/territory level.
